page.title: 19Country Doctor-Cressage.
page.content: Dr.Robertson's{house and surgery are situated at Castle Mound, Cressage. He has been in Cressage for {21 years.}His surgery is open from Monday to Friday, 9 to 10am, 2 to 3pm and 4.30 to 6.30pm for appointments. {He dispenses his own medicines.}A prescription costs the patient Â£2.00. Most of his patients are within a{7 {mile radius}of Cressage. He prefers a country practice where the population is stable, visiting is easy and the surroundings are pleasant. Patients visit the doctor on average{3 or 4 {times a year}and he sees approximately {40 patients a day. Colds}are still the most common complaint and{penicillin the most common drug. He is helped by a District Nurse, Midwife, Health Visitor, Receptionist and Cleaner.He can consult with specialists in hospitals countrywide.
